ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in https://molic-avc.gabriellesantosleandro.com/ValueSet/molicavc-code_professional-valueset/
CodeDisplay
DoctorCRM - Conselho Regional de Medicina
NurseCOREN - Conselho Regional de Enfermagem
NutritionistCRN - Conselho Regional de Nutrição
Occupational_TherapistCOFFITO - Conselho Federal de Fisioterapia e Terapia Ocupacional
PhysiotherapistsCOFFITO - Conselho Federal de Fisioterapia e Terapia Ocupacional
PsychologistsCRP - Conselho Regional de Psicologia
ReceptionistLocal Register - Receptionist

description.value: This ValueSet is integral to the Molic-AVC project and details codes for professionals serving stroke patients in Brazil. It includes: - Doctors: CRM (Conselho Regional de Medicina) - Nurses: COREN (Conselho Regional de Enfermagem) - Nutritionists: CRN (Conselho Regional de Nutrição) - Occupational therapists and Physiotherapists: COFFITO (Conselho Federal de Fisioterapia e Terapia Ocupacional) - Psychologists: CRP (Conselho Regional de Psicologia) - Receptionists: Locally provided code. Each profession is associated with its respective Brazilian registration or licensing entity.

display.value: COFFITO - Conselho Federal de Fisioterapia e Terapia Ocupacional
COFFITO - Conselho Federal de Fisioterapia e Terapia Ocupacional
